title: The Fires of a Nightmare
description: An obsession that has lasted through-out the centuries …Twenty year-old Lilianna Mason is the reincarnation of Ysmay, a woman who, long ago, was the object of desire for the powerful demon lord, Darcamius. Unaware of her past life, Lilianna ignores a certain nightmare involving a hypnotizing demon in an inferno, but when she see a familiar looking man at the coffee shop where she works, she begins to worry about reality and her mental health. Time isn’t in Lilianna’s favor, and when the evil demon finally presents himself to her, she’s saved by his half-demon son, Seth, who will stop at nothing to protect her from his father. Will Lilianna and Seth outrun Darcamius, or will the demon triumph, and finish what he started hundreds of years ago?
author: Chelsea Lynn Charters
